commands.name: az spring certificate add
commands.summary: Add a certificate in Azure Spring Apps.
commands.syntax:
az spring certificate add --name
                          --resource-group
                          --service
                          [--enable-auto-sync {false, true}]
                          [--only-public-cert {false, true}]
                          [--public-certificate-file]
                          [--vault-certificate-name]
                          [--vault-uri]
examples: az spring certificate add --name MyCertName --vault-uri MyKeyVaultUri --vault-certificate-name MyKeyVaultCertName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring certificate list
commands.summary: List all certificates in Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring certificate list --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup -o table

commands.name: az spring certificate list-reference-app
commands.summary: List all the apps reference an existing certificate in the Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring certificate list-reference-app --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyCertName

commands.name: az spring certificate remove
commands.summary: Remove a certificate in Azure Spring Apps.

commands.name: az spring certificate show
commands.summary: Show a certificate in Azure Spring Apps.

commands.name: az spring certificate update
commands.summary: Update a certificate in Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring certificate update --name MyCertName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --enable-auto-sync true
az spring certificate update --name MyCertName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --enable-auto-sync false
